TextpageLeftNav.bodyText:
Power BI Embedded

Embed fully interactive data visualizations in your application

Apply for 1RMB Trial Buy Now

Scale your applications with stunning and interactive visuals, dashboards and reports.

Why embed analytics solutions in your applications?

Develop your business faster

Achieve faster time to market with your applications by minimizing development efforts

Stand out from competitors and bring your applications to life

Make development more efficient

Get Started quickly to access API libraries and SDKs

Focusing on your product rather than developing visual analytics features from scratch

Quickly meet report and dashboard requirements of customers

Create value for your customers

Explore data and get insights from anywhere

Make intelligent decisions quickly in context

Increase their level of business intelligence and feel more confident with data-driven decisions

How can Power BI Embedded help you achieve your expectation

  • Get a complete PaaS solution with cloud development and deployment when using Power BI Embedded - without requiring servers.
  • Connect to hundreds of data sources, so that you deliver valuable insights.
  • Access complete libraries with existing visuals, download community-created visuals or create your own visuals with ease.
  • Use other Microsoft services within the same Azure framework.
  • Keep customers up to date with real-time analytics.
  • Offer customers with high fidelity interactive visualizations across any device - rendered in HTML 5.

Embed Power BI analytics into your applications in three simple steps

1. Create

Create rich visuals with Power BI Desktop. Connect to multiple data sources, format and model your data, explore interactive visuals and publish created content.

2. Develop

Instantly integrate with open source tools, other analytics solutions and dedicated applications. Develop with Power BI Pro by leveraging on familiar tools (such as JavaScript SDK or Visual Studio).

3.Deployment

Register your application in the production environment and deploy with Power BI Embedded.

Use Azure features for embedded analytics

Solutions supported by a trusted cloud

  • Scalable and flexible
  • Globally secure and compliant
  • Reliable infrastructure
  • Premium data services

Learn more

  • About Power BI Embedded
  • Get started with Power BI Embedded
  • Register for Azure AD application
  • Create capacity
TextpageLeftNav.pageTitle: Power BI Embedded_Intelligent Data Analysis Systems - Azure Cloud Computing
TextpageLeftNav.metaKeywords: Azure, Microsoft Cloud, Power BI Embedded
TextpageLeftNav.metaDescription: Azure Power BI Embedded makes data within your applications livelier, enable you to create influential interactive data visualizations for application data within Power BI Desktop without writing any code.
